archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edward J. Edwards Diary, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 11/05/2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally processed in November 2009 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Edward J. Edwards.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Diary, 1891, of Edward J. Edwards, a day laborer. In brief daily entries he mentions what kind of work he did on any given day and for whom, sometimes adding the pay as well. Also mentions his church, illnesses and deaths in town, etc. No location is mentioned.The last few pages contain a story.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
